caption.title: Stratigraphic variation in organic molecules derived from combustion and land plants, the Carbon Preference Index (CPI), and stable carbon isotope ratios.
caption.p: Cadalene and long-chain n-alkanes are according to Mizukami et al. 25. The map shows the paleolocations of the impact site and the sections evaluated. The base map is according to Courtillot et al. 67.
